item.title: Introducing REPL.nvim
item.description: Integrating a REPL in Vim has been a difficult issue in the past, but with Nvim's built-in terminal emulator it is just a few commands away. My new REPL.nvim plugin now puts the REPL only one command away, for any programming language you wish. The end goal is to …
item.dc:creator: HiPhish

item.title: Neovim has tab-local working directories now
item.description:
My Neovim PR to add tab-local working directories has recently been merged. In this post I will explain what it does and why you will love it.

What are working directories in Vim?

If you know Vim feel free to skip this section, otherwise read on. Vim is a terminal …
item.dc:creator: HiPhish
